description:
The Eichholz Law Firm, P.C., in Atlanta, Georgia, helps victims of personal injuries and wrongful deaths. With the help of our main office in Savannah, we have successfully assisted clients from throughout Georgia who have legal needs in the following practice areas:

•         Auto accidents

•         Personal injury

•         Consumer safety law

•         Product liability

•         Dangerous drugs

•         Nursing home abuse

•         Workers' compensation

For over 37 years, we have provided high-quality, personalized attention to our clients as we work to obtain the compensation they deserve. Choosing the right personal injury lawyer is of the utmost importance, and we aggressively fight for our clients' rights while securing maximum benefits. We have secured millions of dollars in awards and settlements for our clients, and this success comes from unceasing devotion to those who seek our services.

Thanks to our passion for justice, we will fight to hold the responsible parties accountable for your injury or loss. Our years of experience and success mean that we have the skills and resources to advocate on your behalf, regardless of the circumstances and the person or entity at fault for your suffering.

No one should suffer alone, and every victim deserves to live in dignity without the added stress of financial insecurity. The attorneys at The Eichholz Law Firm, P.C., offer comprehensive, cost-effective solutions to ensure our clients receive all of their due compensation, and we remain with our clients through each step of the process in order to achieve their goals. To find out more about how our law firm can be your trusted legal ally in your time of need, contact our office for a free initial consultation.
